actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to provide for the striking of medals in commemoration of the 200th anniversary of the signing of the Declaration of Independence by Charles Carroll of Carrollton.

summary.text: Provides for the striking of up to 50,000 bronze medals in commemoration of the two hundredth anniversary of the signing of the Declaration of Independence by Charles Carroll of Carrollton, Maryland.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the striking of medals in commemoration of the 200th anniversary of the signing of the Declaration of Independence by Charles Carroll of Carrollton.
